name: Bubble Jump (DEMO)
description:
Bubble jump is one of our unity projects, a 2D platform game in which you have to reach the end of the level to win, in addition to its career mode where your only enemy is the camera, run away from it. For all ages and compatible with Windows, Linux and Mac.

Remember!, this is a DEMO!

Project: 03

Tutorial: {https://learn.unity.com/project/2d-platformer-template}
